overview: "An evolutionary fever dream. Futurist, post apocalyptic . . . . Animated collage emerging from fluid becomings.  Evolution -  evolution as the uncontainability of change which is located in the destabilization of relations between the concrete and the imagined.  Science fiction is produced out of cultural necessity- a liminal presence that inhabits prediction and flux, resisting definition and containment. Science fiction and technology are tools, as magic is, for transformation." - Mer Maggie Roberts
title: A Wilderness of Elsewheres. Colony 1.
